featured.text: And in 1994, Microsoft CEO (chief executive officer) Bill Gates paid $30.8 million for a handwritten notebook penned by Leonardo da Vinci.

definition.zh_def: 門，通常指進出建築物或圍欄的可移動障礙物。
definition.en_def: A movable barrier that allows or prevents access to an area, typically used for entrances to buildings or enclosures.
definition.example: The gates to the park open at 8 AM every morning.
